p: All patients expressed fear when showing clinical symptoms such as cough with fever where they had a history of exposure to individuals from Wuhan. P4: "I'm done, it must be (novel coronavirus) pneumonia. I'm very scared and my body is shaking." the majority of patients experienced a fear of death. P16: "The first thought I think of is death, I feel like I can't live, and I'm scared." At the same time, some patients remained in denial. P8: "Surely not, how could it be such a coincidence? It may be a cold."
